title: Ceviche with Yummi Pops Nacho Jalapeño Cream
ingredients: 1 pound of precooked shrimp, tail removed
instructions: Step 1: Cook the shrimp with lemon or water.
Step 2: Place the shrimp in a container. You can chop it, as desired.
Step 3: Add diced tomato, red onion, cilantro, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper to taste over the shrimp. Finally, add more lemon juice or just ¼ cup of ketchup and mix.
Step 4: On a flat plate, place Yummi Pops Nacho Jalapeño Cream.
Step 5: Place the ceviche in the center of the plate and take a nacho, add a little ceviche on top. Then, enjoy the flavor of the Pop.
